title: How to Prepare Sooji Halwa

steps.headline: First we need to take a pan and heat the pan on a medium flame.
When the pan is hot add butter to it.
Take the cashews and raisins and fry them in the butter.
Fry the sooji in the butter till it gets golden brown.
Take a pan and boil the water.
Add the sugar to the boiling water.
Take the fried sooji add slowly into the boiling water stir properly otherwise lumps will be formed.
stir the sooji till all the water evaporates.
Add some more butter to it
Then add cashews, raisins and cardamom powder to it.

text: First we need to take a pan and heat the pan on a medium flame.  When the pan is hot add butter to it.  Take the cashews and raisins and fry them in the butter.  Fry the sooji in the butter till it gets golden brown.  Take a pan and boil the water.  Add the sugar to the boiling water.  Take the fried sooji add slowly into the boiling water stir properly otherwise lumps will be formed.  stir the sooji till all the water evaporates.  Add some more butter to it  Then add cashews, raisins and cardamom powder to it.  Finished!
